author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 50-year-old woman was killed and 11 others were injured in an accident at Karisalkulam junction near Kayathar on Tuesday night.

One of the rear tyres of the van in which they were travelling burst, after which the vehicle turned upside down as the driver lost control of it and hit the median, sources said.

The accident occurred while they were returning from Irukkankudi after offering prayers at the Mariamman temple.

The deceased was identified as Esakiammal, wife of Murugan of Mettu Street in Vadukampatti. She died on the spot.

The injured, including five women, were admitted to Tirunelveli Government Medical College Hospital.

Based on a complaint lodged by Muthusamy (27), son of the deceased, Kayathar police have registered a case.
title: Woman killed, 11 others injured in accident
